name: M.Y.R.A. SubQG Integrations
description: A web-based interface to interact with M.Y.R.A (Modular Yearning Reasoning Architecture), featuring an integrated SubQG (SubQuantenfeld-Grundfeld) simulator. This version incorporates deterministic emergence dynamics and RNG controls from SubQG concepts directly into M.Y.R.A.'s affective-cognitive processes, leveraging the Gemini API for intelligent responses. Visualize simulated SubQG states, node activations, emotional states, and adaptive fitness metrics.
